members.name: applicationDirectory
members.description: Read-only directory where the application is installed.

members.name: applicationStorageDirectory
members.description: Read-only directory where the application is installed.

members.name: dataDirectory
members.description: Where to put app-specific data files.

members.name: cacheDirectory
members.description: Cached files that should survive app restarts.Apps should not rely on the OS to delete files in here.

members.name: externalApplicationStorageDirectory
members.description: Android: the application space on external storage.

members.name: externalDataDirectory
members.description: Android: Where to put app-specific data files on external storage.

members.name: externalCacheDirectory
members.description: Android: the application cache on external storage.

members.name: externalRootDirectory
members.description: Android: the external storage (SD card) root.

members.name: tempDirectory
members.description: iOS: Temp directory that the OS can clear at will.

members.name: syncedDataDirectory
members.description: iOS: Holds app-specific files that should be synced (e.g. to iCloud).

members.name: documentsDirectory
members.description: iOS: Files private to the app, but that are meaningful to other applications (e.g. Office files)

members.name: sharedDirectory
members.description: BlackBerry10: Files globally available to all apps

members.name: getFreeDiskSpace
members.description: Get free disk space in Bytes

members.name: checkDir
members.description: Check if a directory exists in a certain path, directory.

params.name: path
params.description: Base FileSystem. Please refer to the iOS and Android filesystems above

params.name: dir
params.description: Name of directory to check

members.name: createDir
members.description: Creates a new directory in the specific path.The replace boolean value determines whether to replace an existing directory with the same name.If an existing directory exists and the replace value is false, the promise will fail and return an error.

params.name: path
params.description: Base FileSystem. Please refer to the iOS and Android filesystems above

params.name: dirName
params.description: Name of directory to create

params.name: replace
params.description: If true, replaces file with same name. If false returns error

members.name: removeDir
members.description: Remove a directory at a given path.

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the directory

params.name: dirName
params.description: The directory name

members.name: moveDir
members.description: Move a directory to a given path.

params.name: path
params.description: The source path to the directory

params.name: dirName
params.description: The source directory name

params.name: newPath
params.description: The destionation path to the directory

params.name: newDirName
params.description: The destination directory name

members.name: copyDir
members.description: Copy a directory in various methods. If destination directory exists, will fail to copy.

params.name: path
params.description: Base FileSystem. Please refer to the iOS and Android filesystems above

params.name: dirName
params.description: Name of directory to copy

params.name: newPath
params.description: Base FileSystem of new location

params.name: newDirName
params.description: New name of directory to copy to (leave blank to remain the same)

members.name: listDir
members.description: List files and directory from a given path.

params.name: path
params.description: Base FileSystem. Please refer to the iOS and Android filesystems above

params.name: dirName
params.description: Name of directory

members.name: removeRecursively
members.description: Removes all files and the directory from a desired location.

params.name: path
params.description: Base FileSystem. Please refer to the iOS and Android filesystems above

params.name: dirName
params.description: Name of directory

members.name: checkFile
members.description: Check if a file exists in a certain path, directory.

params.name: path
params.description: Base FileSystem. Please refer to the iOS and Android filesystems above

params.name: file
params.description: Name of file to check

members.name: createFile
members.description: Creates a new file in the specific path.The replace boolean value determines whether to replace an existing file with the same name.If an existing file exists and the replace value is false, the promise will fail and return an error.

params.name: path
params.description: Base FileSystem. Please refer to the iOS and Android filesystems above

params.name: fileName
params.description: Name of file to create

params.name: replace
params.description: If true, replaces file with same name. If false returns error

members.name: removeFile
members.description: Removes a file from a desired location.

params.name: path
params.description: Base FileSystem. Please refer to the iOS and Android filesystems above

params.name: fileName
params.description: Name of file to remove

members.name: writeFile
members.description: Write a new file to the desired location.

params.name: path
params.description: Base FileSystem. Please refer to the iOS and Android filesystems above

params.name: fileName
params.description: path relative to base path

params.name: text
params.description: content or blob to write

params.name: options
params.description: replace file if set to true. See WriteOptions for more information.

members.name: writeExistingFile
members.description: Write to an existing file.

params.name: path
params.description: Base FileSystem. Please refer to the iOS and Android filesystems above

params.name: fileName
params.description: path relative to base path

params.name: text
params.description: content or blob to write

members.name: readAsText
members.description: Read the contents of a file as text.

params.name: path
params.description: Base FileSystem. Please refer to the iOS and Android filesystems above

params.name: file
params.description: Name of file, relative to path.

members.name: readAsDataURL
members.description: Read file and return data as a base64 encoded data url.A data url is of the form:     data: [<mediatype>][;base64],<data>

params.name: path
params.description: Base FileSystem. Please refer to the iOS and Android filesystems above

params.name: file
params.description: Name of file, relative to path.

members.name: readAsBinaryString
members.description: Read file and return data as a binary data.

params.name: path
params.description: Base FileSystem. Please refer to the iOS and Android filesystems above

params.name: file
params.description: Name of file, relative to path.

members.name: readAsArrayBuffer
members.description: Read file and return data as an ArrayBuffer.

params.name: path
params.description: Base FileSystem. Please refer to the iOS and Android filesystems above

params.name: file
params.description: Name of file, relative to path.

members.name: moveFile
members.description: Move a file to a given path.

params.name: path
params.description: Base FileSystem. Please refer to the iOS and Android filesystems above

params.name: fileName
params.description: Name of file to move

params.name: newPath
params.description: Base FileSystem of new location

params.name: newFileName
params.description: New name of file to move to (leave blank to remain the same)

members.name: copyFile
members.description: Copy a file in various methods. If file exists, will fail to copy.

params.name: path
params.description: Base FileSystem. Please refer to the iOS and Android filesystems above

params.name: fileName
params.description: Name of file to copy

params.name: newPath
params.description: Base FileSystem of new location

params.name: newFileName
params.description: New name of file to copy to (leave blank to remain the same)

members.name: resolveLocalFilesystemUrl
members.description: Resolves a local file system URL

params.name: fileUrl
params.description: file system url

members.name: resolveDirectoryUrl
members.description: Resolves a local directory url

params.name: directoryUrl
params.description: directory system url

members.name: getDirectory
members.description: Get a directory

params.name: directoryEntry
params.description: Directory entry, obtained by resolveDirectoryUrl method

params.name: directoryName
params.description: Directory name

params.name: flags
params.description: Options

members.name: getFile
members.description: Get a file

params.name: directoryEntry
params.description: Directory entry, obtained by resolveDirectoryUrl method

params.name: fileName
params.description: File name

params.name: flags
params.description: Options
